qt3-xslt.zip
-----------------------------------

qt3-xslt.zip contains an XSLT3 formatted test suite, with tests produced from the QT3 test suite, 
using the QT3toXSLT3converter.xsl stylesheet (found in the tools directory of the QT3 test suite). 

The test suite can be run in the same way as the full XSLT3 test suite.

-----------------------------------
2015-09-10 Debbie Lockett (Saxonica)
